title: Cold Email Generator (LLM + RAG)
description: Streamlit app that parses job pages, matches skills via ChromaDB, and generates tailored emails with LLaMA3 via Groq.

title: Connecticut Real Estate Price Forecasting
description: Two-decade CT sales forecasting; RF (R²≈0.92) on log prices, Prophet for seasonality, SARIMA for short-term volume.

title: AI Job Market Trends in USA (Tableau)
description: Pipeline + Tableau dashboard benchmarking AI-role salaries from scraped LinkedIn data and synthetic estimates.
highlights: Geospatial heatmaps, time trends, and filters

title: Portfolio Optimization (BiLSTM-CNN + Attention)
description: Deep-learning portfolio optimizer on OHLCV with BiLSTM-CNN + attention; visualizes candlesticks and performance.
highlights: Backtesting with Sharpe and drawdown metrics
Yahoo Finance ingestion and feature engineering

title: Weather Impact on NYC Collisions
description: Explores how weather affects NYC collision frequency and severity using Meteostat + NYC collision datasets.
highlights: Analyzed severity, contributing factors, vehicle types

title: Stroke Prediction using ML (XGBoost)
description: Predicts stroke risk with gradient boosting; balanced features and ROC-AUC evaluation.
highlights: ROC-AUC and PR curves for evaluation

title: Credibility Detection of Health Web Blogs (XAI)
description: Assesses credibility of health blogs via ML, PageRank, and explainable AI across features like site metrics, author credibility, and ratings.
highlights: Multi-factor scoring of content and metadata

title: Movie Review Sentiment Analysis
description: NLP pipeline on Kaggle reviews: cleaning, tokenization, and classification of positive vs. negative sentiment.

title: Energy Consumption Predictor (NC)
description: Merged housing, energy, and weather datasets to forecast North Carolina energy usage; deployed a Shiny app for current vs. future comparison (Linear Regression ~89%).
highlights: Data fusion of housing, energy, and weather series
Interactive Shiny app for scenario comparison

title: Pandemic Times — COVID Analysis Website
description: Informative COVID-19 website combining ML and Weibull modeling for India/Maharashtra trends, plus a hospital locator and dual ML vs. distribution views.
highlights: Implemented incidence trend modeling via ML and Weibull distribution
Built hospital locator for nearby facilities
